summary: Successfully removed the authentication/sign-in screen from the app. Modified app/page.tsx to go directly to MarketIntelligenceTool without authentication checks. Deleted all authentication-related components (auth-screen.tsx, onboarding-screen.tsx) and NextAuth API routes. The app now provides direct access to all features without any login barriers.
current_status: The Getnius app now loads directly to the main market intelligence platform without authentication. Users can immediately access Search, Enrichment, Action, and Spreadsheet screens. The clean spreadsheet interface with AI-powered column suggestions and bulk operations is fully functional.
